TopicTitle: How to Find which Object we Collided with?

Articles.Content: How can I get a handle to the object which my part collided with in my plugin module?

If anyone is curious , i figured it out :

protected override void onPartUpdate()

{

base.onPartUpdate();

UnityEngine.RaycastHit myray;

if (UnityEngine.Physics.Raycast(this.transform.position, -this.transform.right, out myray))

{

print(myray.collider.gameObject.name );

}

}
